definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The box can be used for both cable and steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 接线箱结构形式分电缆布线和钢管布线两种。

sentences.english: The box can be used for both cable and steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 接线箱结构形式分电缆布线和钢管布线两种。

sentences.english: Building integrated wiring on-site installation supervision and commissioning.
sentences.chinese: 监督楼宇综合布线实地安装和试运行。

sentences.english: The base of the lamp unscrews for wiring and mounting.
sentences.chinese: 台灯的底座可以拧开来进行布线和安装。

sentences.english: Code for engineering design of generic cabling System for building …
sentences.chinese: 建筑与建筑群综合布线系统工程验收规范。

sentences.english: SCAME cable glands are made in self-extinguishing thermoplastic material and designed for cabling and installations in electric boards.
sentences.chinese: 它由阻燃性热塑材料制成，用于电板的布线和安装。

sentences.english: Sufficient wiring and feeding space in the frame.
sentences.chinese: 机架内有充足的布线，走线空间。

sentences.english: There was damp everywhere and the entire building was in need of rewiring.
sentences.chinese: 到处都受了潮，整栋楼需要重新布线。

sentences.english: A routing system for building-block layout is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文简述了一种积木块式版图布线系统。

sentences.english: This reduces wiring and installation costs by 70 percent, Darden said.
sentences.chinese: 达顿表示，这可以减少多达70%的布线和安装成本。

sentences.english: Flexible design for easy routing in corners and around doorframes.
sentences.chinese: 柔软灵活的线身便于在角落和门框处布线。

sentences.english: Cabling problems can be the cause of significant network downtime.
sentences.chinese: 布线的问题可以是重要的网络停机的原因。

sentences.english: Twisted-pair cables are most popular transmission medium in network engineering.
sentences.chinese: 双绞线是综合布线工程中最常用的传输介质。

sentences.english: It makes the wiring of Non-subject equipment more standard and smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 使非标的设备配线更加标准，布线更流畅。

sentences.english: Signal cables and power cables must be routed separately.
sentences.chinese: 信号电缆和电源电缆必须分开布线。

sentences.english: The dissertation discussed the whole procedure of developing MCM layout editor.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了MCM布线编辑器的整个开发过程。
